page.title: 07GHOST STORIES,DRAYTON AREA
page.content: Two places in the area have stories attached to them concerning strange happenings;{Bugg's Grave}& {Ghosthill. { Bugg's Grave},on the Reepham Road, is named after a certain Mr. Bugg who stopped at a crossroads on his way from Norwich,one night.His grey horse was found at the crossroads as was Bugg,the latter hanging in a tree, dead.Bugg's body disappeared,but his horse has been seen on dark nights. {Ghosthill}is in Taverham and there are conflicting stories as to the identity of the ghost;he is either a monk or a soldier,who hanged himself in a tree.Not many people have seen him,but there are many stories concerning the sighting of a white, smoking cross,which has been seen by young and old alike.
